attributes.action: Make an opt out of EU for leavers and let the remainers stay option.
attributes.background: Almost half of the country doesn't want to leave the EU. We should not be forced to do so!! Make an option for remainers to stay and leavers to leave, that way, everyone is happy.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you want to happen.

You could start a new petition calling for the UK Government to negotiate with the EU to allow UK citizens to apply for EU citizenship in an individual basis post-Brexit if that's something you would like to see happen.
